actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To prohibit the importation of motor vehicles from Yugoslavia until the government of that country affords its workers internationally recognized worker rights.

summary.text: Prohibits the entering of motor vehicles from Yugoslavia into the United States until the Secretary of Labor determines that the Yugoslavian Government permits free trade unions and affords its workers internationally recognized worker rights.

titles.title: To prohibit the importation of motor vehicles from Yugoslavia until the government of that country affords its workers internationally recognized worker rights.
